I have created an extensive look at the year in review. Please let me know if I left anything out!
 
 It cqan be read here.....
 http://joebrummer.com/WordPress/?p=512

Your title made me grin, I'm not sure why. :)
 
 Excellent summary. All the events that stuck out in my mind were there. Nicely done!

Informing and interesting. Your site is well done, you fight for what you believe in and do so in a calm, practical, and intellgient manner. Keep up the good work and I hope others follow your example.

Very good summary. I like your stance of nonviolence, and I think that if it was really tried, it would probably work. There was only one thing I didn't notice and that was a mention of South Africa legalizing same-sex marriage. I'm not sure if you left it out accidentally, or if you were just focusing on events here in the US, but I do think it was an important event: The fifth country to legalize actual gay marriages (not counting the many others who give partial rights through civil unions).

 I did forget it, just an oversite I will try to go back and fix.
I did want to say thank you for the compliments on the site. I work pretty hard at it and I am glad people read it and like it. I am especially happy people hear the message about nonviolence.
